132a8(khri brgyad): 'jig pa byung ba na yang 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yang nas yang du phyogs
132b1(khri brgyad): bcu kun gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnamasu yang skye bar 'gyur// yang dang yang du phyogs bcu kun gyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag tu skyes nas kyang
132b2(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal gyi tshor po dag myong bas las zod par byed par 'gyur ro// de dag gis sdug bsngal mang po de dag myong bas las zad par byas nas/ ji ste brgya la mi skye ba thob
132b3(khri brgyad): par gyur na yang / chos kyi phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa de nyid kyis de dag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der / dmus long gi khyim rnams su skye
132b4(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro// gdol pa'i khyim rnams sam/ dgayung po'i khyim rnams sam/ ma rabs kyi khyom rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag tu skyes na yang
132b5(khri brgyad): long ba rnams su 'gyur ba 'am/ zhar ba rnams sam lce med pa rnams sam/ lag pa med pa rnams sam/ rkang pa med pa rnams sam/ rna ba
132b6(khri brgyad): med pa rnams sam/ sna med pa rnams sam/ gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang
132b7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i sgra dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// 
132b8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma mchis pa lnga po dag ni chos kyi phongs par 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyis shing bsags pa de'i 'ol du yang mi mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das
133a1(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa na bzlog par sems shing de dag la 'di skad du 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul
133a2(khri brgyad): ba ma yin/ 'di ni ston pa'i bka' ba ma yin/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma yin/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
133a3(khri brgyad): rnams kyis ma gsungs/ mi gsung gsung bar mi 'gyur ba yin gyis 'di la bslab par mi bya'o zhes zer zhing / de bdag gis kyang bzlog par bya'o// snyam du sems la sos
133a4(khri brgyad): can gzhan dag kyang 'bral bar 'gyur ba byed de/ de rang gi sems kyi rgyud la yang gnod pa byas nas/ gzhan dkyi sems kyi rgyud la yang gnod par bya ba sems/ de rang
133a5(khri brgyad): gi sems kyi rgyud kyang dug dang bcas par byas nas gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud kyang dug dang bcas par byed pa ra 'gyur/ de bdag kyang de chud gsan cing gzhan yang
133a6(khri brgyad): chud gson par 'dod pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma rtogs shing mi shes pas bzlog par sems la gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du 'dzin par byed par 'gyur
133a7(khri brgyad): bar byed pas na/ chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa de'i 'ol du yang mi 'ong ngo zhes brjod par bya ste/ shA ri'i bu ngas ni gang zag de lta bu dag thos par bya bar
133a8(khri brgyad): yang ma gnang na blta ba lta ci smos te/ gnas su lta ga la rung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu dag ni chos sun 'byin pa yin par rig par bya zhing / shA ri'i bu
133b1(khri brgyad): gang zag de lta bu dag ni shing rul pa lta bu dang / nag po'i rang bzhin can yin par rig par bya ba'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu gang dag gang zag de lta bu de dag la dad cing mnyan par bya bar sems
133b2(khri brgyad): pa de dag kyang tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gang nga'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sun 'byin pa'i gang zag de lta bu ni chos sun 'byin par rig par byed do// 
133b3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos sun 'byin par bgyid pa'i gang zag der skyes pa'i lus kyi tshad ni bka' ma stsal lag so// bcom ldan 'das
133b4(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos sun 'byin par bye/ da pa'i gang zag der skyes pa de'i lus kyi tshad ni zhog shi ga/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos sun 'byin par byed
133b5(khri brgyad): pa'i gang zag de'i lus kyi tshad thos na ji tsam du chos sun 'byin par byed pa'i gang zag de'i lus thob pa'i tshad ni 'dra ste/ de la de 'dra ba'i skyon yod do zhes kha nas khrag
133b6(khri brgyad): dron po skyug par 'gyur ba 'am 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am shi lo thug pa'i sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba 'am/ de thos na mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa'am/ 'dam bu sngon po brngas
133b7(khri brgyad): pa ltar skam zhing rnyes par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la de'i lus kyi tshad ni 'di tsam du 'gyur ro zhes skabs dbye ba ma mdzad do// shA ri'i bus
133b8(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las bgyis shing / bsags pa des chos sun 'byin par bgyid pa'i gang zag rnams de lta bu'i lus kyi las yong/ 
134a1(khri brgyad): su 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes slad ma'i skye bo rnams la snang bar bgyid par 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
134a2(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ni chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las rdzogs par byas shing bsags pa des de srid du sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal myong
134a3(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal de'i tshad med de mang ba dang yun de srid du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de nyid kyang phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la snang bar byas par
134a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan/ 'das 'di nyid kyis dkar po'i rang bzhin can gyi rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo chos kyis phongs par 'gyur
134a5(khri brgyad): ba'i sug las de dag las ldog par 'gyur te/ bdag cag kyang sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag dang phrad du 'ong ngo zhes de dag srog gi slad du yang dam pa'i chos spong bar mi
134a6(khri brgyad): bgyid lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos spong ba'i ngag gi las bgyis shing bsags
134a7(khri brgyad): pa des ni chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyid cing sog par 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos bdag cag sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag dang
134a8(khri brgyad): phrad dam de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngam chos mi thos samadage 'dun la bsnyen bkur mi byed dam/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su
134b1(khri brgyad): skye ba'am/ mi dbul po rnams su skye ba 'am/ tshig bzung bar mi 'os par gyur na mi rung ngo // zhes lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams legs pa gdams par bgyi lag so// 
134b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mi blun po gang dag legs par gsung ba'i 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la sun dbyung bar
134b3(khri brgyad): bya'o// snyam du sems pa de dag ni ngag gi las byas shing bsags pa des chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byed cing sogs par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
134b4(khri brgyad): pa la sun dbyung ba byas shing / bzlog pas/ sad ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la sun dang byung bar byas shing zlog pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom
134b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la sun dbyung ba byas shing / bzlog pas ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
134b6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sun dbyung ba byas shing bzlog pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sun dbyung ba byas shing bzlog pas ni/ chos bzlog pa yin no// 
134b7(khri brgyad): chos bzlog pas ni dge 'dun bzlog pa yin no// dge 'dun bzlog pas ni/ 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba bzlog pa
134b8(khri brgyad): yin no// de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
135a1(khri brgyad): dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag bzlog pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
135a2(khri brgyad): bzlog pas/ bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po tshang med/ grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongasu bzung ba yin no// bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po yongs su bzung po des sdus
135a3(khri brgyad): bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba tshad med grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag kyang yongs su bzung ba yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi blun po gang dag
135a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bzlog par bgyid pa de dag rnam pa du zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzlog par bgyid pa lags/ bcom
135a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mi blun po de dag ni/ rnam pa bzhis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzlog par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 
135a6(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ mi blun po de dag bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang chos zab mo rnams la mos pa mi byed cing dad pa mi rnyed pa dang / de dag gi sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu
135a7(khri brgyad): song bas/ phung po lnga la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba dang mi blun po de dag nyes par spyod cing / bdag la bstod pa dang / gzhan la smod pa yin te/ rab 'byor mi blun pa
135a8(khri brgyad): de dag ni rnam pa de bzhi dang ldan pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzlog par byed pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha ro/ 
135b1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis pa dag gis mos par bka' ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
135b2(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ni mngon pa mi brtson pa rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa rnams dang / sdig
135b3(khri brgyad): pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba rnams kyis mos par bka' ba yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar mos par dka' ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
135b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa de ji tsam du zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das dkyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs
135b5(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs yin pa'i phyir/ rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dod / 'du'o/ sa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
135b6(khri brgyad): ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni
135b7(khri brgyad): ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du
135b8(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi/ 
136a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin
136a2(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni nang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// rab/ 
136a3(khri brgyad): 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni
136a4(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ma bcing das ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa
136a5(khri brgyad): bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
136a6(khri brgyad): gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam dngos po med
136a7(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhin ni lam yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
136a8(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po med pa'i
136b1(khri brgyad): rang bzhin ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon gyi mtha' dngos
136b2(khri brgyad): po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dnga'adu byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa dang / rnam pa
136b3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi sngon gyi mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon gyi mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
136b4(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzugs kyi phyi ma'i mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ phyi ma'i mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ 
136b5(khri brgyad): gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du cho ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnamasadang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
136b6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyi ma'i mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi ma'i mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i
136b7(khri brgyad): phyir ro// rab 'byor gzugs da ltar byung ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ltar byung ba'i dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro// 
136b8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar da ltar byung ba ni ma bcings ma
137a1(khri brgyad): grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ltar byung ba dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol
137a2(khri brgyad): pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis pa rnams
137a3(khri brgyad): dang / bdud kyi dbang du mchis pa rnams dang / le lo can rnams dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa rnams dang / skyad ngas pa rnams dang / shes bzhin can ma lags pa rnams
137a4(khri brgyad): kyis mos par dka' ba lag so// bcom ldan 'ang das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
137a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa ni/ mngon par mi brtson pa rnams dang / shes bzhin can ma yin pa'i bar dag gis mos parabaka' ba yin no// rab 'byor gzugs rnam par dag
137a6(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni
137a7(khri brgyad): 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do// 
137a8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni// 'bras bu
137b1(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'o// 'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa
137b2(khri brgyad): de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o// 'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang
137b3(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
137b4(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa/ dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
137b5(khri brgyad): bar du rnam par dag pa 'di dag ni gnyi su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcod du med do// rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag pa gang
137b6(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa'o// rnam pa thos
137b7(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa
137b8(khri brgyad): de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par
138a1(khri brgyad): dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dang de gcad du med do// rab
138a2(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ bdag rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na bdag
138a3(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do// sems can dang / srog dang / 
138a4(khri brgyad): shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba dang da/ 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
138a5(khri brgyad): shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcang du med do// 
138a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dod chags rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na 'dod chags
138a7(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa dang gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyi su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcang
138a8(khri brgyad): du med do// de bzhin du zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ 
138b1(khri brgyad): de ltar na zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyisu dbyer
138b2(khri brgyad): med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do// rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
138b3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par dag pa dang gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
138b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyi su med de gnyi sa su dbyer cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do// rab 'byor gzhan yang ma rig pa rnabang dag pas/ 'du byed
138b5(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa 'du byed rnam par dag pas/ rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa'o// de bzhin du ming dang gzugs rnam par dag pa'o// skye mched drug
138b6(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'o// reg pa rnam par dag pa'o// tshor ba rnam par dag pa'o// sred pa rnam par dag pa'o// len pa rnam par dag pa'o// srid pa rnam par dag pa'o// 
138b7(khri brgyad): skye ba rnam par dag pa'o// skye ba rnam par dag pas/ rga shi rnam par dag pa'o// rga shi rnam par dag pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// sbyin pa'i
138b8(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
139a1(khri brgyad): pa rnam par dag pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu/ 
139a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa rnam par dag pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam
139a3(khri brgyad): par dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/ nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
139a4(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o// da das po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas// / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par dag pa'o// 
139a5(khri brgyad): de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phru/ la gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams da / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan
139a6(khri brgyad): lag rnams dang lam rnam par dag pas thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o// thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pas/ stobs bcu rnam par dag pa'o// 
139a7(khri brgyad): stobs bcu rnam pas dag pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa'o// mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
139a8(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad
139b1(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyi su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do// rab 'byor/ 
139b2(khri brgyad): gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad
139b3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
139b4(khri brgyad): kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do// / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par
139b5(khri brgyad): dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin

139b7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
139b8(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyi su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do// nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
140a1(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
140a2(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o// stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sa sa
140a3(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / 
140a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang
140a5(khri brgyad): so so yang dag pa rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgya sa kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'din
140a6(khri brgyad): gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do// rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dus byas rnam par dag pas/ 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa'o// 
140a7(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pas / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na 'dus byas rnam par dag pa dang / 'dus ma byas rnam pa
140a8(khri brgyad): dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam por dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing / tha mi dad de gcang du med do// rab 'byor
140b1(khri brgyad): gzhan yang 'das pa rnam par dag pas/ ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa'o// ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas/ 'das pa rnam par dag pa'o// da ltar byung ba rnam par dag / 
140b2(khri brgyad): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa'o// 'das pa dang / mya 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas/ da ltang byung ba rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na 'das pa
140b3(khri brgyad): par dag pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do// 
140b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las sems can dmyal ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum curtsada'o// / de nas bcom ldan
140b5(khri brgyad): 'das la 5/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag 'di ni zab pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
140b6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab bo// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du zab pa lags
140b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs shin tu rnam par dge ba'i phyir zab pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
140b8(khri brgyad): par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bab pa yin no// sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / namakha'i khams nga
141a1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bab pa yin no// mig dang na ba dang / sU dang / l+le dang / lus dang / yid shin tu
141a2(khri brgyad): par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no// gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

141a4(khri brgyad): par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no// nang stong pa 'i shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bab pa yin no// dngas po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu
141a5(khri brgyad): par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no// dran pa nye gzhag pa rnams shin tu rlom par dag pa'i phyir ba yin no// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu ma
141a6(khri brgyad): kyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bab pa yin no// stobs bcu dang / maM 'jigs pa

141a8(khri brgyad): dag pa dang / rnam thathams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lar du shis rnam par dag pa'i byung ba 'ayin/ shA'i jom gsas pa bcom ldan ma rnam pa na / 
141b1(khri brgyad): snang ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// shA ri'i dus gsol pa/ @#
141b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das gang shin tu rnam par dge ba'i skad du snang ba legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snu
141b3(khri brgyad): ba yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// mig shin
141b4(khri brgyad): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lde dang / lus dang / yid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni
141b5(khri brgyad): snang ba yin no// gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang / chos shin tu rnam pa/ ra dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// 
141b6(khri brgyad): sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam
141b7(khri brgyad): bar dag pa ni snang ba yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
141b8(khri brgyad): 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par
142a1(khri brgyad): dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni snang ba
142a2(khri brgyad): yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag po shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po da
142a3(khri brgyad): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
142a4(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// rnam pa thams
142a5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyi/ ra rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
142a6(khri brgyad): dag pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol
142a7(khri brgyad): pabacom ldan 'das gang nying mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pas/ rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs 'pho ba med pas
142a8(khri brgyad): nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'pho ba med pas/ nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa yin no// / 
142b1(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu
142b2(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang la kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pas rnam par dag pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis
142b3(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni// rang bzhin
142b4(khri brgyad): gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par dedag pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni thob pa dang / mngon pa
142b5(khri brgyad): rtogs pa ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis bka' stsal pa shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ 
142b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das gang la thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
142b7(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gzugs la thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thob pa med pa dang / 
142b8(khri brgyad): mngon par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni mngon par ma grub pa lags so// 
143a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par grub pam
143a2(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i slad du/ rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa yin no// 
143a3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni 'dod pa'i
143a4(khri brgyad): khams su mi skye lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa de'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
143a5(khri brgyad): ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pa 'dod pa'i khams su mi skye ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ shA ri'i bu 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin
143a6(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa mi skye'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni gzugs kyi khams su mi skye ba lagaso// bcom ldan
143a7(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pa gzugs kyi khams
143a8(khri brgyad): su mi skye ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa mi skye'o// 
143b1(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams su mi skye ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu
143b2(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pa gzugs ma mchis pa'i khamasu mi skye ba lags/ 
143b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' stsal pa shA ri'i bu gzugs med pa'i khams kyis rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa mi skye'o// shA ri'i bus gsol
143b4(khri brgyad): pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni 'tshal ba ma dmachis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dbaka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
143b5(khri brgyad): byir ro// shA ri'i dus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pa 'tshal ba ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
143b6(khri brgyad): ri'i bu chos bems po nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni shes pa med pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni gzugs ma 'tshal ba lags so// 
143b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pas gzugs ma
143b8(khri brgyad): 'tshal ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa shA ri'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par dag pas gzugs mi shes so// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ 
144a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rnam par dag pa ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma 'tshal ba lags so// bcom/ 
144a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
144a3(khri brgyad): dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ma 'tshal ba logs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par dag pas/ 
144a4(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa mi shes so// / shA ri'i bus ga/ srol pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni chos thams
144a5(khri brgyad): cad ma 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam pa/ ra dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom
144a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pas chos thams cad ma 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ shA ri'i bu chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 
144a7(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pas chos thams cad mi shes so// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang phan
144a8(khri brgyad): par mi bgyid/ gnod par yang mi bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol
144b1(khri brgyad): pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par mi bgyid gnod par yang mi bgyid lags bcom ldan 'das
144b2(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par yang mi byed/ gnod par yang mi byed do// 
144b3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ni chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin par mi bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
144b4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i dbus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas chos gang yang
144b5(khri brgyad): yongs su 'dzin par mi bgyid pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa shA ri'i bu chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba nyid kyis phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan
144b6(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs rnam par dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das
144b7(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag rnam par dag pas/ gzugs
144b8(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bdag med pa'i phyir/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis/ 
145a1(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das padag rnam par dag pa'i mang du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa
145a2(khri brgyad): pa rnam par dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
145a3(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
145a4(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bdag med pa'i phyir/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med pa shin tu rnam par dag pa
145a5(khri brgyad): yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa lags so// bcom ldan
145a6(khri brgyad): 'das de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa lags
145a7(khri brgyad): so/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par dag pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i
145a8(khri brgyad): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams rnam par dag pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag
145b1(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i srad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par dag pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams/ 
145b2(khri brgyad): dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rnam par dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
145b3(khri brgyad): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bdag
145b4(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni shin tu rnam par dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pra/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun tu
145b5(khri brgyad): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong
145b6(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub rnam par dag pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor
145b7(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa lags rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa dang / 
145b8(khri brgyad): bdag rnam par dag pas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan
146a1(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dgu pa'i
146a2(khri brgyad): slad du/ byang chub rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan
146a3(khri brgyad): 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pa'i/ byang chub rnam par dag pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab
146a4(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam dpar dag pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi du rnam par dag pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis
146a5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ rnam
146a6(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes pa ma rnyed pa ma stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
146a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das gnyis su ma mchis shing rnam par dag pa ni thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
146a8(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ gnyis su ma mchis shing / rnam par dag pa thob
146b1(khri brgyad): pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba
146b2(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
146b3(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ gzugs
146b4(khri brgyad): kun tu mtha' yas shing rnam par dag pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha
146b5(khri brgyad): ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun du mtha 'a yas pa'i slad du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
146b6(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab
146b7(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
146b8(khri brgyad): pa kun tu mtha' yas shing rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
147a1(khri brgyad): nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
147a2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i
147a3(khri brgyad): slad du de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
147a4(khri brgyad): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang da' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
147a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa ni tshu rol gyi 'gram 'am/ pha rol gyi 'gram 'am/ gnyi ga ma mchis pas mi dmigs lags/ bcu ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin
147a6(khri brgyad): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol
147a7(khri brgyad): gyi 'gram 'am/ pha rol gyi 'gram 'am/ gnyi ga ma mchis pa yang mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
147a8(khri brgyad): kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
147b1(khri brgyad): 'di ltar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'du shes su bgyid na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu bgyid pa lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang ring du bgyid pa lags so// 
147b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legs legs// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ming du yang chags/ mtshan mar yang chags te/ rab 'byo
147b3(khri brgyad): chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa/ ming med pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na ming du yang chags pa lags/ mtshan mar yang chags pa
147b4(khri brgyad): lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab de 'byor 'di la theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ming du
147b5(khri brgyad): yang 'dzin pa byed/ mtshan mar yang 'dzin par byed cing ming dang mtshan mar gzung nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rloms su byed de/ de dag shes rab/ 
147b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rloms su byed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing rgyang ring du byed pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sem
147b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang chags pa dang / ma chags pa 'di dag legs par bshad cing / shin tu mthar gtugs pa ni ngo mtshar
147b8(khri brgyad): lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
148a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa ni gang yin/ ma chags pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di la byang chub
148a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
148a3(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams la yang
148a4(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / 
148a5(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong / ngo zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// dran/ pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'du shes na
148a6(khri brgyad): chags pa yin no// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / 
148a7(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// / 
148a8(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pas/ 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na
148b1(khri brgyad): chags pa yin no// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams lang ltar byung ba zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin
148b2(khri brgyad): nor tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sems dang po bskyed phyin chad dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
148b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod na chags pa yin no// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa yin no// 
148b4(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / sto/ das dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams
148b5(khri brgyad): la spyod na chags pa yin no// stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
148b6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na chags pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
148b7(khri brgyad): spyod bi ma chags pa gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di
148b8(khri brgyad): snyom du gzugs kyis gzugs kun du mi shes so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa kun tu mi shes so// 'das
149a1(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams kyis 'das pa'i chos rnams kun du mi shes so// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kyis/ ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kun du mi shes so// da ltar
149a2(khri brgyad): byung ba'i chos rnams kyis da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kun du mi shes so snyam du mi semaso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha
149a3(khri brgyad): khyi la spyod pa la spyod pa ni nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
149a4(khri brgyad): dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa
149a5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / 
149a6(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// 'di la sbyin par
149a7(khri brgyad): bya'o// 'di sbyin par bya'o zhe'am/ de bzhin du bdag gis tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab bsgom par bya'o// 
149a8(khri brgyad): shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o// shes rab 'di ltar bsgom par bya'o zhe 'am/ bdag gis bsod nams spel bar bya'o// bsod nams 'di spel bar bya'o// bsod nams 'di
149b1(khri brgyad): ltar spel bar bya'o zhe'am/ bdag ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'o// bdag ni sems can yongs su smin
149b2(khri brgyad): par byed pa'o// bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed pa'o snyam du mi sems te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la
149b3(khri brgyad): mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la ni/ de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa dag med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs
149b4(khri brgyad): la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma chags pa yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 
149b5(khri brgyad): btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen por chags par 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di la
149b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpas semasu kun du shes pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kun du shes pa
149b7(khri brgyad): dang nang stong pa nyid kun tu shes pa dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du kun du shes pa dang stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang so so yang
149b8(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su kun du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su kun du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas las
150a1(khri brgyad): bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams su kun du shes pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/ brtul cing gzhal ba nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang / 
150a2(khri brgyad): chub tu yongasu bsngo bar byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chags pa ste/ des ni chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus so// de ci'i
150a3(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni yongs su bsngo bar mi nus la/ ko'u shi ka tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i
150a4(khri brgyad): rang bzhin yang yongs su bsngo bar mi nus shing / de bzhi nan du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang de bzhin yang yongs su bsngo bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro// ko'u
150a5(khri brgyad): shi ka gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du gzhan dag la ston par 'dod pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
150a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i yid kyis yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya/ yang dag par gzeng bstod par bya// yang dag
150a7(khri brgyad): par rab tu dga' bar bya zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ci nas kyang bdag ni sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'o// bdag ni tshul khrims bsrung ba'o// bdag ni bzod pa bsgo
150a8(khri brgyad): pa'o// bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o// bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'o// bdag ni shes rab bsgom pa'o// bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'o// bdag
150b1(khri brgyad): ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'o// bdag ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa'o// bdag ni byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'o snyam du rnam par rtog par/ 
150b2(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / de ltar gzhan dag la yang dag par ston pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa
150b3(khri brgyad): dang yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa de ni bdag kyang nyams par mi 'gyur la/ de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
150b4(khri brgyad): pa yin no// ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na pos de ltar gzhan dag la yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya/ yang dag par gzeng
150b5(khri brgyad): bstod par bya/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ste/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de// ngag gis de ltar chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su
150b6(khri brgyad): spang bar bya'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i mtha' de
150b7(khri brgyad): dag bstan pa ni legs so// legs so// rab 'byor chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba gzhan dag kyang khyod la bstan par byas/ de dag legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig/ 
150b8(khri brgyad): dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad
151a1(khri brgyad): ces bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'di la blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis/ de bzhin
151a2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa mtshan mar yid la byed na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas / 
151a3(khri brgyad): bar bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongasu mya ngan las 'das
151a4(khri brgyad): nas ji srid dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar de'i dge ba'irtsab gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la bye/ dad cing / yid la byas nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
151a5(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor rje/ tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa thams cad da
151a6(khri brgyad): bral ba rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag dang / de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang mtshan mar yid la byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
151a7(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan
151a8(khri brgyad): ma yid la bya ba ma yin la/ de dag las gzhan pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
151b1(khri brgyad): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin/ 
151b2(khri brgyad): gyis dben pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
151b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byas shing / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par rtogs par mi nus so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
151b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par dka' ba lags so// bcom ldan 'ad das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos kyi rang
151b5(khri brgyad): bzhin ni gnyis su ma yin te/ gcig tu zad do// rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no// gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni
151b6(khri brgyad): ma byas pa'o// gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar rang bzhin gcig pa dang / rang bzhin
151b7(khri brgyad): ma yin pa dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas par shes na/ chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
151b8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong ma thos
152a1(khri brgyad): shing bye brag ma phyed de/ rnam par ma shes la mngon par rdzogs par khong du ma chud pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
152a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang mi shes pa ste/ 
152a3(khri brgyad): gzugs kyis mi shes so// tshor dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pas mi shes so// khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung
152a4(khri brgyad): ba rnams kyis mi shes so// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyo gus kyi chos rnams kyis mi shes so// stobs rnams dang / 
152a5(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis mi shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
152a6(khri brgyad): khri brgyad stong pa las chos thams cad rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan
152a7(khri brgyad): 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa po ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
152a8(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad dmigs su med par byed pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
152b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po / 
152b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal te gzugs la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang // 
152b3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes po la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / pha
152b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag
152b5(khri brgyad): par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres parnams dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
152b6(khri brgyad): spyod pa yin no// gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
152b7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du
152b8(khri brgyad): gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// bde zhes bya ba dang sdug
153a1(khri brgyad): bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 
153a2(khri brgyad): spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de
153a3(khri brgyad): lta bu'i gzugs med la/ gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba
153a4(khri brgyad): dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang med cing / de bzhin du rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ 
153a5(khri brgyad): bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug/ par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ nyid kyi bar dag kyang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan
153a6(khri brgyad): yang nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal te gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ 
153a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/ yongs su
153a8(khri brgyad): ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/ yongs su ma rdzog
153b1(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa 'am yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya/ 
153b2(khri brgyad): ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin la/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/ 
153b3(khri brgyad): yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin zhing / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
153b4(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs pa 'am yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi
153b5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshwa dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
153b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di ltar chags pa dang chags pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la legs par gsungs pa ni/ 
153b7(khri brgyad): ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
153b8(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa dang / ma chags pa dag legs par bshad do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
154a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gzugs chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// tshor ba
154a2(khri brgyad): dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// mig chags pa med
154a3(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du rna bo dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na
154a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// sbyin dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med pa zhes bya ba dar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// 
154a5(khri brgyad): de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod
154a6(khri brgyad): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
154a7(khri brgyad): pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
154a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na gzugs chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
154b1(khri brgyad): chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
154b2(khri brgyad): dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa
154b3(khri brgyad): med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu rtsa dgu pa/ de nas
154b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos bstan pa zab mo 'di bshad kyang 'phel ba ma mchis la/ 
154b5(khri brgyad): ma ba shad kyang 'grib pa ma mchis pa de ni ngo mtshar lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
154b6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bshad kyang 'phel ba med la ma bshad kyang 'grib pa med do// rab 'byor 'di lta
154b7(khri brgyad): ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing / na mkha'i bsngags pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa
154b8(khri brgyad): brjod par gyur kyang na mkha' la ni bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med la bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'grib pa med do// nam mkha' la ni bsngags kyang 'phel ba med// ma bsngags
155a1(khri brgyad): kyang 'grib pa med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med la/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'grib
155a2(khri brgyad): pa med do// bsngags pa brjod kyang rjes su chags pa med / bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang khong khro ba med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de yang
155a3(khri brgyad): bshad kyang de bzhin la/ ma bshad kyang de bzhin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
155a4(khri brgyad): pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa mi na bar mi 'gyur la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa dang / bla na med pa yang
155a5(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang slar mi ldog pa de ngag ni dka' ba bgyid pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
155a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni na mkha' bsgom pa lags te/ na mkha' la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
155a7(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma mchis/ na mkha' la ni
155a8(khri brgyad): gzugs kyang ma mchis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma mchis/ na mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid kyang ma mchis
155b1(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma mchis na mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang ma mchis yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / 
155b2(khri brgyad): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams kyang ma mchis/ namakha' la ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang
155b3(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma mchis na mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang ma mchis/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong
155b4(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / de dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kying ma mchis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
155b5(khri brgyad): byang chub kyang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom lda na 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen gang dag gis/ sems can rnams kyi slang du go cha
155b6(khri brgyad): 'tshal ba de dag ni na mkha'i slang du brtson par 'tshal ba dang / 'bad par 'tshal ba dang / rtsol bar 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag sems can rnams kyi
155b7(khri brgyad): slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongasu dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis/ na mkha' lta
155b8(khri brgyad): bu'i chos thams cad kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni gi cha chen po 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis sems can rnams kyi slad du go chachen po 'chal ba de dag ni
156a1(khri brgyad): nam mkha' bar snang la 'degs par 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na
156a2(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
156a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis/ de lta bu'i go cha 'tshal ba de dag la bdag phyag 'tshal lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
156a4(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa da ngag gis 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ 'dam bu'i 'tshal lam/ 'od ma'i 'tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi
156a5(khri brgyad): tshal lam/ mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/ til gyi shingaltar yongs su bltam par gyur cing / de bzhin gshe/ gas pa de dag gis skal pa 'am/ skal pa las lhag par
156a6(khri brgyad): chos bshad par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang / sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag yongasu smin par mdzad kyang bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams
156a7(khri brgyad): la ni 'grib pa 'am/ 'phel bar mi mngon pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan
156a8(khri brgyad): 'das de bzhin du phyogs bcu thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams re re yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis/ 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram
156b1(khri brgyad): shing gi tshal lam/ mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/ til gyi zhing ltar yongs su bltam par gyur cing bzhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis skal pa'am/ skal pa las lhag par/ 
156b2(khri brgyad): chos bshad par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag yongs su smin par mdzad kyang / bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khas
156b3(khri brgyad): la ni 'grib pa 'am 'phel bar mi mngon lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can ma mchis pa dang sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
156b4(khri brgyad): des na bdag gis 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
156b5(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ nam mkha' yongasu dgrol bar 'tshal ba lagaso zhes gsol to// de nas dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ 
156b6(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste chos gang yang skye ba yang med/ 'gag pa yang med la tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/ shes rab kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i
156b7(khri brgyad): phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
156b8(khri brgyad): dang dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/ dkon mchog gsum po sangs rgyas
157a1(khri brgyad): dang chos dang / dge 'dun yang yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo snyam
157a2(khri brgyad): mo de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
157a3(khri brgyad): pa 'di la rnal 'byor du byed pa de/ gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha
157a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya bar sems dpa' de ni/ na mkha' la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol
157a5(khri brgyad): to/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid
157a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba ji lta bu zhig bgyi lags/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka
157a7(khri brgyad): khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyab/ 
157a8(khri brgyad): pab dang / sba bar bya ba'i chos de ni kho bos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji skad bstan pa bzhin du
157b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas na 'di nyid de la bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbeng bar 'gyur ro// ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral na/ 
157b2(khri brgyad): de la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyi kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la/ gang zhig bsrung
157b3(khri brgyad): ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba bar bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar sems pa yin no// ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis
157b4(khri brgyad): sgyu ma dang mig rgyu dang rmi lam dang / brag cha/ da dang mig yor dag bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa da da/ sba bar nus snyam 'am/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun
157b5(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa ko'u shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dang / 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
157b6(khri brgyad): dag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba bar bya bar sems pa de yang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang / ngal ba'i skal pa can du 'gyur bar zad do// ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ 
157b7(khri brgyad): khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dag bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba bar bya bar nus snyam 'am/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun
157b8(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la bsrung ba
158a1(khri brgyad): dang bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya bar sems pa de yang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang / ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad do// ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sas/ 
158a2(khri brgyad): khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / snga bar nus snyam 'am brgya byin/ 
158a3(khri brgyad): gyis smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa ko'u shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
158a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa la spyod pa dag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa ro drang sba bar bya bar sems pa de yang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad do// 
158a5(khri brgyad): brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ji tsam gyis na chos
158a6(khri brgyad): thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lto bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu
158a7(khri brgyad): yongs su shes par 'gyur zhing de ltar yongasu shes nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rmi lam lta bur yang rloms sems su mi byed na/ rmi lam bdag
158a8(khri brgyad): gi zhes bya bar rloms sems su mi byed rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed cing / sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed
158b1(khri brgyad): sprul pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom semasu mi byed/ sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ koru
158b2(khri brgyad): shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal te gzugs rlom semasu mi byed/ gzugs bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems
158b3(khri brgyad): su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyi mtshan mar yong rlom semasu mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom
158b4(khri brgyad): sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed na// rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed/  cing / sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul
158b5(khri brgyad): pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom semasu mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no// de bzhin
158b6(khri brgyad): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom semasu mi byed/ rnam
158b7(khri brgyad): par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom semasu mi byed/ rnam pa
158b8(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom semasu mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
159a1(khri brgyad): kyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed na/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam lacho
159a2(khri brgyad): sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed cing / sprul pa'i bar du rlomasas su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom
159a3(khri brgyad): semasu mi byed/ sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom semasu mi byed pa yin no// de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi
159a4(khri brgyad): lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa 'dun
159a5(khri brgyad): na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag tham sa cad lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dag thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das
159a6(khri brgyad): ga la ba de logs su mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas
159a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis shar phyogs na sangs rgyas stong rnam pa 'di
