159a8(khri brgyad): dag nyid dang ming 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthus dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dang / lha'i
159b1(khri brgyad): dbang po brgya byin sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dag sems la snang bar gyur to// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / 
159b2(khri brgyad): steng dang / phyogs 'tshams kun na yang / sangs rgyas stong stong rnam pa 'di dag nyid dang / ming 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ dge slong rab 'byor
159b3(khri brgyad): ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin sha stag gis/ 
159b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dog se dmas la snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'dadas kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal/ 
159b5(khri brgyad): torab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang / chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / sa phyogs
159b6(khri brgyad): 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro// gang dag skal pa bzang po 'di la 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
159b7(khri brgyad): de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro// de
159b8(khri brgyad): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
160a1(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag
160a2(khri brgyad): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par 'gyur lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa tha
160a3(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gzugs
160a4(khri brgyad): bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzug das bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs sdug ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par
160a5(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bcings zhes bya ba dang grol na sa bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin/ du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
160a6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces
160a7(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba dang grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
160a8(khri brgyad): ro gzugs 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
160b1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'das pa dang / 
160b2(khri brgyad): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba dang / grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur// 
160b3(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par
160b4(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur lags/ bcom lnga ngan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs shin
160b5(khri brgyad): tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
160b6(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag sde
160b7(khri brgyad): chos ston par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongasu dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ 
160b8(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
161a1(khri brgyad): par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
161a2(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ 
161a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab
161a4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
161a5(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med/ pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
161a6(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med
161a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam pa
161a8(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
161b1(khri brgyad): nyid yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang na mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
161b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag po'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' la ni skye
161b3(khri brgyad): ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor na mkha' gos pa med pa'i
161b4(khri brgyad): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bco ma ldan 'das ji ltar na na mkho' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad
161b5(khri brgyad): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lagasabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ra na mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
161b6(khri brgyad): pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na na mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags
161b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
161b8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' smra ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
162a1(khri brgyad): na brag cha gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du rab 'byor na mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor nas/ 
162a2(khri brgyad): nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa ma
162a3(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' la ni rab tu brjod pa gang yang med de/ 
162a4(khri brgyad): de ltar na nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i phyir/ shes pang rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor na mkha' dmig su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
162a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam/ mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol
162a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' la ni ci yang dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na nam mkha' dmig su med pa'i phyir
162a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med
162a8(khri brgyad): pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
162b1(khri brgyad): dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
162b2(khri brgyad): med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag
162b3(khri brgyad): pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
162b4(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun
162b5(khri brgyad): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dgapa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji
162b6(khri brgyad): ltar na/ chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigasu ma mchis pa dang skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par
162b7(khri brgyad): byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi/ 
162b8(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba
163a1(khri brgyad): dang klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la ni/ mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lag so// rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad
163a2(khri brgyad): dang lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lagaso// yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur lags so// lus ngal bar mi 'gyur
163a3(khri brgyad): lag so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos nyan par 'tshal ba'i lha stong phrag mang po dag kyang 'brang bar 'gyur lag
163a4(khri brgyad): so rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas pa/ tsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'a/ brang bar 'gyur lagaso// gang na dam pa'i chos smra ba'i rigs
163a5(khri brgyad): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di smra bar bgyid pa der/ lha'i tshogs mang po dag kyang 'du bar 'gyur/ 
163a6(khri brgyad): lag so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di smra bar bgyid pa de ni bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur te/ bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma
163a7(khri brgyad): mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa dag skyed par 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am// 
163a8(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smra bar byed pa de ni/ bsod nams dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam
163b1(khri brgyad): gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa dag bskyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che yin pa'i phyir ro// rang/ 
163b2(khri brgyad): 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la brten nas/ sems can dmyal ba las thar par 'gyur ro// dud 'gro'i skye gnas las thar par 'gyur ro// gshin rje 'jig rten
163b3(khri brgyad): las thar par 'gyur ro// mi dbul po las thar par 'gyur// rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 
163b4(khri brgyad): ro/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'du shes med 'du shes med
163b5(khri brgyad): min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa yin no// lan cig/ 
163b6(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskyed par byed pa yin no// 
163b7(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de la brten nas rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / bram
163b8(khri brgyad): ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su yod pa dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
164a1(khri brgyad): dang 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod pa dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams yod pa
164a2(khri brgyad): dang tshangs ris dang / tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes
164a3(khri brgyad): med pa'i sems can rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang
164a4(khri brgyad): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams yod pa dang / rgyun du
164a5(khri brgyad): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla med pa
164a6(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 
164a7(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag
164a8(khri brgyad): pa rnams yod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams yod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid
164b1(khri brgyad): yod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yod pa dang / stobs bcu yod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
164b2(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa'i phyir te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las de dag la sogs pa'i chos rnams
164b3(khri brgyad): rgya cher bstan pas na/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che zhes bya'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni skye ba 'am/ 'gag
164b4(khri brgyad): pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba da'am/ yongs su bzung ba 'am/ dor ba'i chos gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang dag skye
164b5(khri brgyad): ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ dor ba'i chos de dag med pa'i phyir ro// rab
164b6(khri brgyad): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma
164b7(khri brgyad): tho ba med pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa med pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos
164b8(khri brgyad): gang yang dmigs su med do// rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che yin te/ rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni chos gang gis kyang ma gos pa yin no// de ci'i
165a1(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor des na pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di gos pa med pa yin no// 
165a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal te de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed/ de ltar rnam par rtog pa yang mi byed/ de ltar
165a3(khri brgyad): spros par yang mi byed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba yin te/ 
165a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya dab dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
165a5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sang sa rgyas kyi zhing du song nas kyang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu
165a6(khri brgyad): dag par byed do// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang thob par byed pa ma yin/ ston par byed pa ma yin/ 'dzin par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin par byed pa
165a7(khri brgyad): yang ma yin/ skyed par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'gog par byed pa yang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa yang ma yin/ rnam par byang bar byed pa yang ma yin/ 'grib
165a8(khri brgyad): par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'phel bar byed pa yang ma yin/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// rab 'byor she
165b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yang ma yin/ gnas par byed pa yang ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs
165b2(khri brgyad): med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yang ma yin/ gnas par byed pa yang ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa
165b3(khri brgyad): yang ma yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang
165b4(khri brgyad): ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 
165b5(khri brgyad): 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar/ byed pa yang ma yin/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba
165b6(khri brgyad): dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ stobs
165b7(khri brgyad): bcu sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
165b8(khri brgyad): brgyad sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong
166a1(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin par byed
166a2(khri brgyad): yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ so so'i
166a3(khri brgyad): skye bo'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa
166a4(khri brgyad): yong ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ rab 'a byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi
166a5(khri brgyad): khams 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi/ khams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i/ phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung
166a6(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'di ni gnas pa nyid de/ de de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par thug
166a7(khri brgyad): su chud de/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par thugs su chud nas kyang / bsrung ba dang / rnam par 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / ston par mdzad
166a8(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro// de nas lha'i bu 'bum phrag khrag khrig rab tu mang po dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ ca co dang ga zha 'don cing lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar
166b1(khri brgyad): bo dang / man da ra ba dag gis gtor nas/ 'di skad du a la la 'dzam+bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo zhes ched du brjod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
166b2(khri brgyad): 'di bstan pa na/ de las lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka'
166b3(khri brgyad): stsal to// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'jug par bya ba 'am/ ldog par bya ba'i phyir/ nye bar
166b4(khri brgyad): gnas pa ma yin pas/ rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo da bskor ba gnyis pa yang ma yin/ gcig pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
166b5(khri brgyad): 'das gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang 'ju ga par bgyi ba 'am/ ldog par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i
166b6(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // de bzhin du bsam
166b7(khri brgyad): gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong
166b8(khri brgyad): ngo dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo // de bzhi
167a1(khri brgyad): du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ni lam rnams kyis stong
167a2(khri brgyad): stobs bcu ni stobs bcus stong ngo // mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
167a3(khri brgyad): kyis stong ngo // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo // de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra baH/ 
167a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da kyis stong ngo // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan/ 
167a5(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags te/ chos thams cad kyang chos thams
167a6(khri brgyad): cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
167a7(khri brgyad): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang / chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis shing / chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la/ chos gang yang 'jug par
167a8(khri brgyad): bgyid pa 'am/ ldog par bgyid pa yang ma mchis te/ chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba yang ma mchis la/ chos gang yang yongs su ma mthong ba yang ma mchis lags so// 
167b1(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang 'jug pa 'am/ ldog pa'i chos de dmigasu ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gtan mngon par ma grub pa lags pas/ stong pa
167b2(khri brgyad): nyid ni 'jug par bgyid pa 'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lags la// mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa yang 'jug par bgyid pa 'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma
167b3(khri brgyad): lags so// de ltar na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang rab tu bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / gdags pa dang / 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'grel
167b4(khri brgyad): pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / smos pa dang / gsal bar bgyid pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa
167b5(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa lagaso// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan// sus/ kyang ma gzung lagaso// gang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus
167b6(khri brgyad): kyang ma bzung ba de ni/ sus kyang mngon sum du ma bgyis lag so// gang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung / sus kyang mngon sum du ma bgyis pa de ni/ yongs su
167b7(khri brgyad): mya ngan las 'das pa su yang ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di las su yang sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba yang ma mchis lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ 
167b8(khri brgyad): gnas med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum curtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
168a1(khri brgyad): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
168a2(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid lags so// / 
168a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad dmigasu med par mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
168a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dben nga pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyiraro/ 
168a5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di/ lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu/ phyin pa 'di ni rdzib ma mchis pa lags so// bcom
168a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
168a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhi ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ ming med pa dang / lus med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
168a8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba
168b1(khri brgyad): dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa lagaso// 
168b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
168b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rna bar
168b4(khri brgyad): shes pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'a byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
168b5(khri brgyad): 'gro ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
168b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad
168b7(khri brgyad): bzung du med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi bas pa lag so// bcom
168b8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad shin tu byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
169a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med
169a2(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das
169a3(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
169a4(khri brgyad): shes pa po ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dra/ 
169a5(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'pho ba ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'ad/ sa kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dmigs
169a6(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jigs pa ma mchis pa lags so// 
169a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi
169a8(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam lta bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam rmis pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
169b1(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brag cha lta bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgra'i brjod pa
169b2(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor lta bu lags so// bcom
169b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs brnyan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa
169b4(khri brgyad): 'di ni smig rgyu lta bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba dka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan/ 
169b5(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigasu med
169b6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'ad
169b7(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su ma mchis pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha
169b8(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
170a1(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan
170a2(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mong pa med tha mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol/ 
170a3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
170a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dmigasu ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas
170a5(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis
170a6(khri brgyad): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
170a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom
170a8(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das
170b1(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
170b2(khri brgyad): 'dod chags dang bral ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba de bzhin nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa'i phyir ro// rab
170b3(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
170b4(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa
170b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'ad/ sa kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshanam med cing dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab
170b6(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
170b7(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol po bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin 'di ni zhe
170b8(khri brgyad): sdang ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// // shes rab kyi pha
171a1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po sum cu ba/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
171a2(khri brgyad): pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gti mug gi mun pa rnam par sel ba nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
171a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa yongs su rtog pa med pa'i
171a4(khri brgyad): phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan de 'ongs 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa lags so// bcom
171a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sems can dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
171a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
171a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' dmigs su
171a8(khri brgyad): med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma 'dres pa lags so// bcom ldan 'ad
171b1(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nag
171b2(khri brgyad): nog ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
171b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rnam par rtog po dmigs su med
171b4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so// bcom
171b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'odas kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi/ tshad dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyi/ sa gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab
171b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad na mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i phyir ro// 
171b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
171b8(khri brgyad): thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba lags so// 
172a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad lhag par chags par bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa dang / bcom
172a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa'i
172a3(khri brgyad): phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
172a4(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med dpa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bco ma ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol
172a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
172a6(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos
172a7(khri brgyad): rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid lags
172a8(khri brgyad): so bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes
172b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa phyi nang gi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
172b2(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa
172b3(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid lag so// 
172b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyi dad dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha
172b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// 
172b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
172b7(khri brgyad): pa 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus
172b8(khri brgyad): ma byas stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
173a1(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha'
173a2(khri brgyad): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa
173a3(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
173a4(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di da ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid lags so// bcom da ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
173a5(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol/ pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid
173a6(khri brgyad): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
173a7(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs
173a8(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dgi lam nyid stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan
173b1(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
173b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
173b3(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
173b4(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
173b5(khri brgyad): ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
173b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos
173b7(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran
173b8(khri brgyad): pa nye bar gzhag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
174a1(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i spong ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
174a2(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol
174a3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcoM
174a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol ba tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po lags so// bcom lnga dan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigasu
174a5(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu hU~M/ na pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs lags so// bcom
174a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin
174a7(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol/ 
174a8(khri brgyad): pabacom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa
174b1(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das
174b2(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa// lta bar gyur pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
174b3(khri brgyad): mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
174b4(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin dpa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom daldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam dmigs su
174b5(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcu ma ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lags so// btso/ 
174b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa
174b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab
174b8(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
175a1(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan/ 
175a2(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor/ 
175a3(khri brgyad): gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chal pa'i
175a4(khri brgyad): tshul khrims dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa
175a5(khri brgyad): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ pa/ gnod sems dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
175a6(khri brgyad): lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab
175a7(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
175a8(khri brgyad): g.yeng ba dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab lags so// 
175b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chal ba'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu
175b2(khri brgyad): byin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
175b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa
175b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyi das gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang
175b5(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bka' stsal pa thams cad du ye shes chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol/ 
175b6(khri brgyad): pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad yod
175b7(khri brgyad): su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lags so// 
175b8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol/ bcom ldan
176a1(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad
176a2(khri brgyad): kyi de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das
176a3(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs
176a4(khri brgyad): rgyas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa
176a5(khri brgyad): las dmigs su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cuH/ brgyad pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 
176a6(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag pa de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag por bya ba byas pa yin la/ gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi
176a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin no// gang dag 'dzin pa/ 
176a8(khri brgyad): dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs la/ bklags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa lta smos
176b1(khri brgyad): kyang ci dgos rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs
176b2(khri brgyad): la bklags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas mang po dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
176b3(khri brgyad): bu mo gang dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas kyang / mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
176b4(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang yongs su zhu ba bya/ das pa yin no// gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha ro rnal tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang / mi skrag mi dngang
176b5(khri brgyad): zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni/ skal pa bye ba phrag mang po dag nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
176b6(khri brgyad): 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
176b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang par mi 'gyur la/ 'chang ba dang / klog pa
176b8(khri brgyad): dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yang brtson par bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnaMs
177a1(khri brgyad): ji lta ba de ltar gzung bar bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis ni zab lags te/ sngon pha rol tu
177a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa drug po dag la ma spyad pa dag gis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par rngo mi thog pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes
177a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs pa lagaso// de ci'i
177a4(khri brgyad): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za/ rab mo 'di la dad pa ma mchis pa dang / dga' ba ma mchis
177a5(khri brgyad): pa dang / dang ba ma mchis pas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sangs rgyas rnams dang / sa sa rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
177a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ nang stong
177a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ni ji ltar
177a8(khri brgyad): bsgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan
177b1(khri brgyad): lag dang lam rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyimi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
177b2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su zhu ba ma bgyis pa'i slad du'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA
177b3(khri brgyad): ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu de la ngo mtshar yang ci che ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
177b4(khri brgyad): mngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo/ 'di la mos par ma gyur pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang // tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / 
177b5(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes ra kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos par ma gyur pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la mos par ma gyur pa dang / dngos po
177b6(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mos par ma gyur pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mos par ma gyur pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
177b7(khri brgyad): dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos par ma gyur pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
177b8(khri brgyad): pa zab mo 'di spong bar byed pa ni ngo mtshar mi che'o// btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal/ 
178a1(khri brgyad): ba yin pas na/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad
178a2(khri brgyad): ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag
178a3(khri brgyad): 'tshal ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las nges
178a4(khri brgyad): par byung la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis rab tu bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir te/ ko'u shi ka rnam pa thams
178a5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ la gnas par bya'o// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad
178a6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed par 'dod pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa ya
178a7(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha
178a8(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// de bzhin du sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong // 
178b1(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
178b2(khri brgyad): la dgod par 'dod pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs su bsdu bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bya'o// 
178b3(khri brgyad): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
178b4(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa
178b5(khri brgyad): dang tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi na pa la ji ltar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rna 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha
178b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyad na nang stong po nyid la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lagasaji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ bcom
178b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rnal 'byor du bgyid
178b8(khri brgyad): pa lags/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
179a1(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rnal
179a2(khri brgyad): 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka gang khyod de bzhin gshegs
179a3(khri brgyad): ba la don de yongs su zhu ba sems pa ni leg so legs so// ko'u shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa bskyed pa de yang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin te/ ko'u shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu
179a4(khri brgyad): nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// / ko'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/ da' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gzugs
179a5(khri brgyad): la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
179a6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// de bzhin du mig la mi gnas/ rna ba dang / 
179a7(khri brgyad): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mi gnas te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin gzugs la mi gnas/ sgra dang / dri dang / 
179a8(khri brgyad): dang reg bya dang / chos rnams la mi gnas te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed de/ de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu
179b1(khri brgyad): byin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas par shes
179b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la
179b3(khri brgyad): mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du
179b4(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam la mi
179b5(khri brgyad): gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// tshad med pa bzhi la mi gnas par shes rab/ kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// bsam gtan
179b6(khri brgyad): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la mi gnas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
179b7(khri brgyad): bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang la gnas pa dang / gang
179b8(khri brgyad): la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i gzugs de dmigs su med pa dang / de bzhin du gang la gnas pa dang / gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
180a1(khri brgyad): dang rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
180a2(khri brgyad): dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / 
180a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi phyir
180a4(khri brgyad): gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang da/ 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi
180a5(khri brgyad): byed de/ gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed // de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams
180a6(khri brgyad): dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
180a7(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor bar mi
180a8(khri brgyad): byed pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rnal 'byor du byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gzugs mngon gyi mthar mi
180b1(khri brgyad): dmigs/ gzugs phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs gzugs da ltar byung bar mi dmigs shing / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes/ 
180b2(khri brgyad): ba sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs rnam par shes pa da ltar byung bar mi dmigs la/ de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnas
180b3(khri brgyad): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi
180b4(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcoM brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
180b5(khri brgyad): da ltar byung bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de nas ba com ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
180b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no// shA ri'i
180b7(khri brgyad): bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no// shA ri'i bu
180b8(khri brgyad): de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
181a1(khri brgyad): chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin
181a2(khri brgyad): nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gting dpag dka' ba lag so// 
181a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor/ 
181a4(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shos darab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no// 
181a5(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad
181a6(khri brgyad): dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
181a7(khri brgyad): rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad
181a8(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no// shA ri'i bu de
181b1(khri brgyad): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ 
181b2(khri brgyad): khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
181b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab
181b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no// shA ri'i bu/ sa gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
181b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems da / pa' sems dpa' chen po gal te gzugs zab ces bya
181b6(khri brgyad): bar mi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab ces
181b7(khri brgyad): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / 
181b8(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag
182a1(khri brgyad): par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe/ 
182a2(khri brgyad): na shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i zab
182a3(khri brgyad): ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa
182a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi/ phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
182a5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi zab po nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
182a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar
182a7(khri brgyad): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi
182a8(khri brgyad): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / 
182b1(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
182b2(khri brgyad): 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin/ 
182b3(khri brgyad): pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / 
182b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi
182b5(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam sa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi gting
182b6(khri brgyad): dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
182b7(khri brgyad): rnams kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
182b8(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal te gzugs tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
183a1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad
183a2(khri brgyad): med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / 
183a3(khri brgyad): de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
183a4(khri brgyad): sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dadang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad med
183a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no// zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
183a6(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab
183a7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de tsam du zab pa dang / de tsam du gting dpag dka' ba dang / de tsam du rtogs par dka' ba dang / de tsam du tshad ma mchis pa lags te/ bcom ldan
183a8(khri brgyad): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste/ de dag gis shes rab
183b1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/ skrag cing dngang la/ dngang par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du
183b2(khri brgyad): bshad par bgyi ste/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang la dngang par mi 'gyur zhing nem nur bgyid par mi 'gyur/ the tsom 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i
183b3(khri brgyad): steng du thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ba lags so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu theg pa la gsar du
183b4(khri brgyad): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na nyes pa cir 'gyur/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 
183b5(khri brgyad): ko'u shi ka theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad par gyur na/ 
183b6(khri brgyad): skrag cing dngang la/ dngang par 'gyur zhing phyir bzlog pa dang / phyir spong bar 'gyur te/ mos par mi 'gyur la/ ko'u sho ka gang gi phyir theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
183b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ phyir spong zhing log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i la sogs par 'gyur te de yun ring pos kyang bla na med pa yang
183b8(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba'i gnas de yod do// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
184a1(khri brgyad): bo lung bstan pa gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na mi skrag mi dang zhing dang bar mi 'gyur ba lta ga la yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 
184a2(khri brgyad): ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni ring po mi thogs
184a3(khri brgyad): par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis las mi 'da' ba'i bar gyi bla na med
184a4(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de de bzhin
184a5(khri brgyad): no de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dang zhing
184a6(khri brgyad): dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
184a7(khri brgyad): gnas par 'gyur ba de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shing pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa yin no// de nas
184a8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dper brjod par bdag shin tu spobs lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag shin
184b1(khri brgyad): tu spobs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sh+nu 'i bu khyod spobs par gyis shig/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper babyed na/ 
184b2(khri brgyad): pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo zhig gi g.yar lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
184b3(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis
184b4(khri brgyad): pa'i bar dag rmis por gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo dgas pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa lags par rig par
184b5(khri brgyad): bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag sad pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
184b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
184b7(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis shing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
184b8(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa lta smos ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab
185a1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed cing thos nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags so// 
185a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid
185a3(khri brgyad): ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yong dag par zhugs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyi
185a4(khri brgyad): pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub se/ mas dpa' rnams dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
185a5(khri brgyad): kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed par 'gyur zhing rnyed par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid
185a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du nye ba 'am/ lung bstan par
185a7(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyin/ mi zhig 'phrog
185a8(khri brgyad): dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur tam 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad nyis brgya pa zhig nas sam/ dpag tshad sum brgya ba zhig nas sam/ dpag
185b1(khri brgyad): tshad bzhi brgya pa zhig nas sam/ dpag tshad lnga brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur nas/ de byung ba'i tshe grong khyer gyi snga ltas pa lang rdzi dag gam/ phyugs rdzi dag gam/ sa mtshams
185b2(khri brgyad): sam kun dga' ra ba 'am/ tshal dag gam/ bskyed mos tshal dag mthong bar gyur tam/ grong khyer gyi snga ltas grong dag gam/ grong rdal dag gam/ ljongs dag gam/ yul
